sentences.en: " Are you all right, sir? " asked Bert.
sentences.cn: “ 你没事吧, 先生? ” 伯特问道.

sentences.en: " I shouldn't worry about it,'said Bert, " I often have a chat to myself! "
sentences.cn: “ 我才不去操这份心, ” 伯特说, “ 我也常常自言自语. ”

sentences.en: " What little man? " asked Bert, puzzled.
sentences.cn: “ 什么矮个子男人? ” 伯特迷惑不解地问.

sentences.en: And I remembered Bert Jeffries’s letter telling me to stay away.
sentences.cn: 我记得伯特.杰弗里斯的来信告诫我远离战场。

sentences.en: Bert Brown hated to see a man cry. It embarrassed him.
sentences.cn: 伯特-布朗讨厌男人哭, 这使他感到窘迫.

sentences.en: Bert is a voluble, gregarious man.
sentences.cn: 伯特是个能说会道、善于交际的人。

sentences.en: Bert looks a sturdy fellow, one who was made for action.
sentences.cn: 伯特样子很结实,像个理想的实干家.

sentences.en: Bert was a footloose, unemployed actor.
sentences.cn: 伯特是不受雇于任何人的自由演员。

sentences.en: Bert was reluctant to tell mother the machine was broken again.
sentences.cn: 伯特不愿告诉母亲洗衣机又坏了.

sentences.en: Bert, the kid's not even a hundred percent Irish.
sentences.cn: 伯特, 那个年轻人不是100%爱尔兰人.

sentences.en: He might have been seriously injured if it had not been for Bert.
sentences.cn: 要不是伯特,他可要大吃苦头了.

sentences.en: I never enjoy meeting Bert Dykes. He never has anything to do.
sentences.cn: 我就怕遇到Bertdykes. 他从来都是无事可做.

sentences.en: Mr. Bert At six o'clock on weekdays, and one o'clock on Saturdays.
sentences.cn: 伯特:工作日是六点, 星期六是一点.

sentences.en: Now, Bert, quit hogging the limelight.
The farm was owned by two brothers Joe and Bert Cox.
sentences.cn: 农场的主人是乔·考克斯和伯特·考克斯两兄弟.

sentences.en: These two guys, in case you forgot, are called Bert and Ernie.
sentences.cn: 以防忘记，我告诉大家这两个人物叫伯特和尔尼。

sentences.en: To increase the terrifying effect , Bert rattled the tea tray and played The Bay of Biscay.
sentences.cn: 为了增加恐怖的气氛, 伯特一面敲着茶盘一面吹奏着《比斯开湾之曲》.
